Name: Artist's Special Cocktail
Ingredients: 45 ml Lustau Oloroso Don Nuño Sherry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with redcurrants bunch laid across rim.
Review: Irish whiskey is often matured in oloroso sherry seasoned casks so it's no surprise that whiskey and sherry blend harmoniously in this cocktail, with lemon tartness balanced by rich red currant syrup, the key ingredient that makes this cocktail "Special".
History: A voraciously pink Parisian special from the 1920s, this cocktail first appears in print in Harry MacElhone's 1927 Barflies and Cocktails .
Nutrition: One serving of Artist's Special Cocktail contains 189 calories
